document_data.name: Dheolur
document_data.mainbody: '''Dheolur''' was a noble house of [[Cormyr]] that was extinct by the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], thanks to its repeated treachery.
document_data.Base:
The noble house had its seat in the town of [[Dhedluk]], which was formerly named Dheolur after the family.

One of its houses was situated beyond the [[Royal Gardens]] in [[Suzail]], [[Cormyr]], and another in the [[King's Forest]], protected by a 20-foot-high (6.1 meter) wall, built on top of the ruins of a temple of [[Moander]].
document_data.History: The house was elevated to nobility by the grandfather of King [[Duar Obarskyr]]. When [[Magrath the Minotaur]] seized control of [[Suzail]] around [[429 DR]], the house swore fealty to him almost immediately.
